summary: Bank for those who are in need of one
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][b][u][color=#ff0000]Only if you have completed Thieves Guild questline.and if you are on side of Imperial Legion.[/color][/u][/b]

Adds a Bank where Mercers House used to be.Armed Guard hired from Companions Is Inside,and there is also adjutant and bank director.

You have your own Savings Account,which works on Container base,where you can save your cash.
You also have your safe for valuables
and a account ledger which enables you to take your monthly incomes.
You monthly incomes are calculated : Arch Mage salary 2500 septims and Leggate salary 700 septims,which you can take from time to time.

Your account and saving account are on the first floor room straight ahead,while your safe for valuables is located in the basement.You need key for all of those which is on the table of adjutant.[/font]


[font=Arial]Hope you like it :)[/font][/size]
author: ibrica_orahovac
